pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, June 27, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, June 27, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario

7:00 p.m The Prime Minister will host an Official Dinner for the President of Mexico, Enrique Pe√±a Nieto.

Casa Loma
1 Austin Terrace
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for arrivals
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.
  • Pooled coverage for remarks

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
